text: Bianca Miquela Landrau (born August 16, 1991), known professionally as Bia, is an American rapper from Boston. She debuted on the Oxygen reality television series Sisterhood of Hip Hop. In 2014, Landrau signed to the record label I Am Other. Her first EP, Nice Girls Finish Last: Cuidado, was released in 2018. In 2020, Bia signed a new record label with Epic Records. On December 11, 2020, she released her second EP, For Certain. The EP spawned the single "Whole Lotta Money", which was later released as a remix featuring Nicki Minaj and went to number 16 in the Billboard Hot 100. In 2022, Bia was featured on German rapper Luciano's single "Bamba" alongside English rapper Aitch, which debuted at number one in Austria, Germany and Switzerland. Landrau was born in Medford, Massachusetts. She is of Puerto Rican and Italian descent. == References == Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:African- American rappers Category:Rappers from Massachusetts Category:Musicians from Boston Category:People from Medford, Massachusetts
title: Bia (rapper)
